extDesr.message: Manage extensions,quickly enable/disable,support batching operation. support custom layout and smart sorting. fast, simple and safe.

speedManageDesc.message: One key to disable all extensions (except for themes & locked extensions)

speedManageLock.message: Click the icon to lock/unlock the extension:

otherDesc.message: Not bad to use, you can visit the Chrome Web Store to give praise or provide supportive suggestions

otherDonate.message: If you like, please have a cup of coffee and motivate me to continue refining it :-)

showBadgeDesc.message: Show the number of extensions currently enabled (except for locked extensions)

showExtNameDesc.message: The name is displayed when the mouse rolls over the extensions icon

tipsTitle.message: No other extensions have been installed :-)

rightMoreDesc.message: Right-click on the extended icon to operate more functions
